title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Horsham Shire
creator_credit: Roberto Salvatore, Jessica Scott and ACMI
brief_description: Down Victoria’s Western Freeway, to the north of the Grampians, lie three towns that help to make up Horsham Shire. The towns of Horsham, Natimuk and Laharum are all from the same region, but, in meeting the locals, we get to see what truly makes these unique towns tick and why the locals wouldn’t want to live anywhere else.
